alert.note: Alert for Hoke; Moore; Richmond; Scotland (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 1:36PM EDT until July 14 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Moore County in central North Carolina... Scotland County in central North Carolina... Southeastern Richmond County in central North Carolina... Hoke County in central North Carolina... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 136 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Hoffman, or 10 miles northwest of Laurinburg, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Laurinburg, Southern Pines, Rockingham, Raeford, Pinehurst, Hamlet, Aberdeen, Hoffman, Pinebluff and Dobbins Heights. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
